column1: Figure 2: UK GDP fell by a cumulative 22.1% in the first half of 2020, more than double the fall seen in the United States over this period
Quarter 4 (Oct to Dec) 2019 to Quarter 2 (Apr to Jun) 2020

column2:
1. Chart shows the percentage change in real GDP in Quarter 2 (Apr to June) 2020 compared with Quarter 4 (Oct to Dec) 2019. 
2. Data as at 11 August 2020.
